pages.text: Portable braziers can be carried in your inventory, and opened when holding with right click. It's only use is to thaw $(l:resting/aspics)aspics$(/l) into soups.
There are an input slot, a water bowl slot, an output slot and a fuel slot in the brazier GUI. Though water is not required in stew pots to thaw aspics, a bowl of water is always necessary here.
Portable braziers consume one fuel item each time they work. Vivid charcoal and magma cream are accepted as fuel.

There are two way to obtain vivid charcoal: craft with magma cream and charcoal, or rest slime balls, charcoal and lava together. Vivid charcoal is cheaper than magma cream, and it can only be used in portable braziers.
